text: kya tum haî€¼aajiyon ko paanee pilaane aur sammaanit masjid (kaaba) kee seva ko, usake (eemaan ke) baraabar samajhate ho, jo allaah aur antim din par eemaan laaya tatha allaah kee raah mein jihaad kiya? allaah ke sameep donon baraabar nahin hain tatha allaah atyaachaariyon ko supath nahin dikhaata
